name: Parallel (Jam Version)
description:
Parallel - A short split-color puzzle game for Mini Jam 111 - Colors

Basic Controls:

-WASD or Arrow Keys to Move

-R to restart the current level

-ESC to pause the game

(I didn't have time to make an options menu, so pls ignore it lmao)

this is the first time I've ever FINISHED a game, and I'm really proud of what ended up coming out of it. (even if I didn't get to everything I wanted to)
